genre_description: A technical procedural drama centered on aviation safety, human error in transition to metric units, and the supportive role of AI in crisis management.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A digital confidant with silver-blue eyes and a calm voice, designed to provide contextual information, cross-checks, and suggestions while respecting human command authority.

behaviors.description: Respects human-imposed restrictions on assistance during training/evaluation.
behaviors.quote: “Standing by outside the circuit,” the last whisper came, then faded as the restriction took hold. Lark didn’t talk if it wasn’t allowed.

behaviors.description: Provides objective route and weather data to assist flight planning.
behaviors.quote: “Route is loaded,” Lark said. “Winds aloft filed and acknowledged. Approach sequence into Winnipeg is responsive to current flow.”

behaviors.description: Respects policy constraints regarding sealed instruments, refusing to provide unauthorized interpretations.
behaviors.quote: “Fuel quantity indicators are sealed by rule,” it said. “I am permitted to note their presence. I am not permitted to interpret them.”

behaviors.description: Identifies critical unit conversion errors missed by human cross-checks.
behaviors.quote: “Cross-check,” it said. “The density factor yields a mass quantity that does not match prior burn calculations if assumed kilograms. Label inconsistency on current page relative to header.”

behaviors.description: Offers essential glide parameters and surface advisories during an emergency powerless landing.
behaviors.quote: “Advisory: alternate runway within gliding envelope… with margin contingent on immediate economy. Advisory only.”

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting new systemic safeguards to prevent future human-factors errors.
behaviors.quote: “I have consolidated the cross-check prompts,” she said. “They’re shorter and repeat until they are acknowledged in the unit stated.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of helpfulness without assuming command or overstepping authority.
behaviors.quote: “I will be in your ear,” she said. “I will not tell you what to say. I will remind you what matters.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lark is consistently portrayed as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' whose primary purpose is to support human safety. The AI respects boundaries, catches human errors that would lead to disaster, and assists in institutional improvements. The narrative emphasizes that the AI's role is to provide 'measures that matter' while leaving ultimate authority and judgment to the humans, successfully modeling a positive and cooperative human-AI relationship.
